Text.Name: zhuxianzhen
Text.Description: Since time immemorial, this has been the formation with the greatest offensive power. When deployed, it will turn into four banner gates each with a sword hanging above it, completely surrounding the center. Once activated with primordial spirit, the four swords will vibrate, and the formation is immediately filled with Sword Aura. Even the truest immortal will find it difficult to survive in.

Text.Name: qixingzhen
Text.Description: An immortal formation said to have been passed down from the Evil Exorcising Perfected Warrior of Ninth Heavenly Paradise. It can direct the power of seven stars to form the Grand Chariot's divine light of Aloofness, a power capable of obliterate all evil.

Text.Name: wufangbumiezhen
Text.Description: A great formation based on the five Vast Banners which have existed since the beginning of time itself. The northern banner is referred to as Black Vulture, the southern as Soaring Flame, the central banner as Yellow Apricot, the western as White Cloud, and the eastern as Green Lotus. The combination of the Five Elements forms the Domain of Vastness, which cannot be invaded despite the changing of natural laws.

Text.Name: liuyuzhen
Text.Description: A ceremonial formation of the Celestial Court. When forming this formation, it will unfold a pristine abode of the six gods of the Celestial Court, turning the Mortal Realm into a paradise, granting people spiritual harmony.
Text.SuitEffect.1.Description: New Skill: Domain of Heavenly Serenity

Text.Name: longxingzhen
Text.Description: A fascinating formation that utilizes the body of Flood Dragon as its foundation. It is said to be a dragon-controlling formation. When used, one can draw upon the power of dragon souls to perform miracles.

Text.Name: fengjianzhen
Text.Description: A fascinating formation that utilizes the body of Phoenix as its foundation. It is said to be a phoenix-controlling formation. When used, one can draw upon the power of phoenix souls to perform miracles.
Text.SuitEffect.0.Description: New Skill: Divine Sword of Phoenix

Text.Name: yinyangzhen
Text.Description: A formation that drew its inspirations from the flow of energies between Heaven and Earth. It is said that this formation is used according to the laws of Yin and Yang. Utilizing the transformation of Yin and Yang, the formation becomes extremely flexible.

Text.Name: sanyinzhen
Text.Description: A formation used by utilizing the idea of the Three Talents: Heaven, Earth and Humanity. It is said to be capable of concentrating all the pure Yin energies of the world, which greatly enhances your power.

Text.Name: bamen_ji
Text.Description: It is said to be a formation used according to the rules of the Eight Trigram Gates. Enhances protection ability of the formation by utilizing the Gate of Life.

Text.Name: bamen_xiong
Text.Description: It is said to be a formation used according to the rules of the Eight Trigram Gates. Enhances artifact mastery ability of the formation by utilizing the Gate of Death.

Text.Name: bamen_zhong
Text.Description: It is said to be a formation used according to the rules of the Eight Trigram Gates, making the formation more compact.

Text.Name: jiayimushenzhen
Text.Description: Formed by concentrating the essence of the Primordial Eastern Wood Spirit, it is said to be a formation capable of awakening the Qi of vitality of both Heaven and Earth, rejuvenating all living things.
Text.SuitEffect.2.Description: New Skill: Domain of Wood Essence

Text.Name: wuyuezhen
Text.Description: A formation formed by the spiritual essence of the Five Peaks. When used, it will present the form of the Five Peaks to ward a location, rendering it indestructible.
Text.SuitEffect.2.Description: New Skill: Domain of Five Peaks
